title: Dawn of a Blade yet to be forged
text: You are ore, you have been ore for as long as you can remember, part of the earth and the broader world, mayhaps poisonous for other critters if ever removed from your earthen home but such concerns are outside of you... until one fateful day you are stolen, taken... but maybe this too isn't such a bad experience as you look at the blacksmith who eyes you with eyes of an emotion you have never had directed at you before, intruige, anticipation, desire
